experiences.title: Island Exterior Fabricators
experiences.summary: Managing project schedules and logistics for large-scale façade projects valued between $2M–$60M, ensuring materials and equipment reach site per construction milestones.

episodes.title: Digital Automation & Process Improvement
episodes.description: Proactively developed digital trackers and AI-driven automations to streamline repetitive documentation, delivery tracking, and material status reporting—enhancing visibility and improving logistics accuracy.

episodes.title: Material Delivery Coordination
episodes.description: Coordinated with procurement teams and vendors to align lead times, improving material delivery reliability and reducing schedule disruptions across multiple project packages.

episodes.title: Multi-Trade Coordination
episodes.description: Facilitated coordination among 5+ trades to resolve field conflicts, maintain workflow continuity, and support seamless project execution.

episodes.title: Design-Assist Collaboration
episodes.description: Collaborated with design, engineering, and construction teams during design-assist phase to address constructability and sequencing challenges while managing RFIs, change orders, and transmittals.

experiences.title: Boston University
experiences.summary: Working for the director and faculty of project management under various capacities ranging from designing new construction curriculum to planning, organizing and implementing projects.

episodes.title: Construction Curriculum Development
episodes.description: Designed new construction curriculum and organized course material. Prepared summaries for meetings, classes, and presentations to enhance learning outcomes and improve educational delivery.

episodes.title: Industry Research & Data Analysis
episodes.description: Reviewed real-world data for trends of Construction Management courses within USA, providing insights for program improvements and strategic planning initiatives.

episodes.title: Stakeholder Coordination
episodes.description: Interfaced with research teams, STEER and PMI on strategy, alignment, planning and mitigating issues across various project management initiatives and partnerships.

episodes.title: Master's Thesis Research
episodes.description: Completed comprehensive research on Implementation of Agile Project Management in Construction. Explored how Agile principles can revolutionize construction management through flexibility, stakeholder collaboration, and iterative planning. Backed by global case studies from U.S., Macau, and Iraq.

experiences.title: Black Box Architects
experiences.summary: Launched and managed residential construction and interior projects, delivering them within budget while maintaining highest quality standards. Demonstrated entrepreneurship drive through independent practice.

episodes.title: Interior & Residential Project Management
episodes.description: Initiated and managed 4 interior projects with budgets up to $27,000 USD. Managed 3 significant projects in Udaipur with budgets up to $94,000 USD, ensuring quality and budget adherence.

episodes.title: Consultant Appointment & RFI Management
episodes.description: Entrusted with key projects for Anupama Kundoo Architects based on client recommendations, highlighting dedication to excellence. Responsible for managing RFI processes.

episodes.title: Team Leadership & Coordination
episodes.description: Successfully managed and supervised a team between 10-20 subcontractors, ensuring coordination and timely completion of projects within schedule.

episodes.title: Safety & Compliance
episodes.description: Monitored construction sites for safety compliance and city standards adherence, emphasizing commitment to project safety.

episodes.title: Lean Construction Implementation
episodes.description: Implemented lean principles and adopted pull planning, resulting in a 15% increase in schedule efficiency by reducing project throughput.

experiences.title: BlackBox Visuals
experiences.summary: Created detailed models and realistic renders for architects and builders' projects. Demonstrated entrepreneurship by building independent visualization practice from the ground up.

episodes.title: 3D Visualization Services
episodes.description: Created detailed models and realistic renders for architects and builders' projects, delivering high-quality visualizations that brought designs to life.

episodes.title: Facade Design Consultation
episodes.description: Provided design consultation for facades and implemented those in the models to provide realistic view and feasibility assessment for clients.

episodes.title: Independent Practice Growth
episodes.description: Built successful freelance visualization practice from scratch, establishing client relationships and delivering consistent quality across diverse project types.

experiences.title: Sanjay Mathur Associates
experiences.summary: Started on small residential project design tasks and progressively entrusted with overseeing larger projects ranging from $540,000 to $1,350,000 USD for on-site execution. Successfully delivered all projects within budget and time.

episodes.title: Project Progression & Scale
episodes.description: Started on small residential project design tasks and progressively entrusted with overseeing larger projects ranging from $540,000 to $1,350,000 USD for on-site execution.

episodes.title: Team Mentorship & Supervision
episodes.description: Effectively supervised and mentored a team of up to 30 subcontractors, imparting innovative construction techniques in alignment with design specifications.

episodes.title: On-Time & On-Budget Delivery
episodes.description: Successfully delivered on all projects within budget and time while verifying construction documentation to meet client requirements and vision.
